mapper.select: insert into delegates (surname, name, middle_name, signature_link, created_at) values (#{surname}, #{name}, #{middleName}, #{signatureLink}, NOW()) RETURNING id;
mapper.update: update delegates set surname = #{surname}, name = #{name}, middle_name = #{middleName}, signature_link = #{signatureLink}, updated_at = NOW() where 1 = 1 and id = #{id};
mapper.delete: update delegates set deleted_at = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #{delegateId}
